name: A. Vasya the Hipster
statement:
One day Vasya the Hipster decided to count how many socks he had. It
turned out that he had red socks and blue socks.According to the latest
fashion, hipsters should wear the socks of different colors: a red one
on the left foot, a blue one on the right foot.Every day Vasya puts on
new socks in the morning and throws them away before going to bed as he
doesn’t want to wash them.Vasya wonders, what is the maximum number of
days when he can dress fashionable and wear different socks, and after
that, for how many days he can then wear the same socks until he either
runs out of socks or cannot make a single pair from the socks he’s
got.Can you help him?
